    C

    categoryFormatter(String) - Static method in class utils.CategoryUtility
    Formats a category string into the expected form if it matches one of the predefined categories when converted to lowercase.

    L

    listActiveNotes() - Method in class controllers.NoteAPI
    Lists all active notes If no active notes exist, returns "No active notes stored".
    listAllNotes() - Method in class controllers.NoteAPI
    Lists all notes in a friendly format, including index.
    listArchivedNotes() - Method in class controllers.NoteAPI
    Lists all archived notes If no archived notes exist, returns "No archived notes stored".
    listItems() - Method in class models.Note
    Lists all items associated with the note object in a friendly format.
    listItemStatusByCategory(String) - Method in class controllers.NoteAPI
    Lists completion status of items for a given category Shows both completed and TODO items, along with totals If no notes exist, returns "No notes stored". If the category is invalid or no items match, returns "No notes with category [category]". Otherwise returns a formatted string including totals and lists of completed and TODO items.
    listNotesBySelectedCategory(String) - Method in class controllers.NoteAPI
    Lists all notes belonging to a category.
    listNotesBySelectedPriority(int) - Method in class controllers.NoteAPI
    Lists all notes with a given priority.
    listTodoItems() - Method in class controllers.NoteAPI
    Lists all items that are not completed ([TODO]).
    load() - Method in class controllers.NoteAPI
    Loads the notes from an XML file ("notes.xml") into the notes ArrayList using XStream and DomDriver.

    T

    toString() - Method in class models.Item
    Creates a friendly String representation of the current item object's state, with itemDescription and isItemCompleted fields formatted/modified to text.
    isItemCompleted will be represented as follows: if isItemCompleted is true => [Completed] is appended to the String. if isItemCompleted is false => [TODO] is appended to the String. Sample output straight from assignment spec (Author: Dave Hearne):
    Secondary School 3:30.
    toString() - Method in class models.Note
    Returns a user-friendly string representation of the note object, including: note object attributes associated items and item attributes, through calling methods from Item Sample outputs from the assignment spec:
    toTwoDecimalPlaces(double) - Static method in class utils.Utilities
    This method takes in a decimal point number and truncates it to two decimal places.
    truncateString(String, int) - Static method in class utils.Utilities
    This method returns a string that was passed as a parameter, truncated to a specific length, also passed as a parameter.
    tryAgain() - Static method in class utils.Utilities
    Prompts the user to try again, then converts the user's response to a boolean value.
